title: Impact of Orthophosphate on the Solubility and Properties of Lead Orthophosphate Nanoparticles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00152D, Paper
Casey Formal, Darren A. Lytle, Stephen Harmon, David Wahman, Michael DeSantis, Min Tang
Orthophosphate (PO4) is a commonly used corrosion control treatment to reduce lead (Pb) concentrations in drinking water. PO4 reduces Pb concentrations by forming relatively insoluble lead phosphate (Pb-PO4) minerals. In...
